alert.note: Alert for Chouteau; Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 2:33AM MST until March 08 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Fergus, Chouteau, Eastern Glacier, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton Counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of heavy snow is expected at the onset of the snow. Rapid accumulations and a flash freeze will likely accompany this heavy snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Chouteau; Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Fergus
